article_ref: Art. 27 Abs. 1 SVG; Art. 4a Abs. 1 und Art. 5 VRV; Art. 22 Abs. 1 SSV
law_text: Exceeding the general, vehicle-related or signposted maximum speed after deduction of the device and measurement safety set by ASTRA on highways
notes: Speeding by 1-5 km/h after deduction of tolerance.

article_ref: Art. 27 Abs. 1 SVG; Art. 4a Abs. 1 und Art. 5 VRV; Art. 22 Abs. 1 SSV
law_text: Exceeding the general, vehicle-related or signposted maximum speed after deduction of the device and measurement safety set by ASTRA on highways
notes: Speeding by 6-10 km/h after deduction of tolerance.

article_ref: Art. 27 Abs. 1 SVG; Art. 4a Abs. 1 und Art. 5 VRV; Art. 22 Abs. 1 SSV
law_text: Exceeding the general, vehicle-related or signposted maximum speed after deduction of the device and measurement safety set by ASTRA on highways
notes: Speeding by 11-15 km/h after deduction of tolerance.

article_ref: Art. 27 Abs. 1 SVG; Art. 4a Abs. 1 und Art. 5 VRV; Art. 22 Abs. 1 SSV
law_text: Exceeding the general, vehicle-related or signposted maximum speed after deduction of the device and measurement safety set by ASTRA on highways
notes: Speeding by 16-20 km/h after deduction of tolerance.

notes: Speeding by 21-25 km/h after deduction of tolerance.
